name: The East Keep
description:
Please read everything

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You and your wife are sailing to a new land in hopes of starting a new life. On your way, you stop to resupply at an old stronghold of your people, only to be kidnapped. Fight your way through the fortress and defeat the strange beast that has taken hold of the keep to save your wife.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A and D to move

Space to jump

LMB to attack once you pick up the axe

Hold and Release RMB to shoot once you pick up the bow

F2 to reset application

L to reset to last save

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Credits

Code - Zlogav

Art - Zlogav

Title Theme - Mauo https://opengameart.org/content/danger

Credits Theme - VWolfdog https://opengameart.org/content/soft-mysterious-harp-loop

Thanks To:

SussLord for help with Saving and Shaders https://gamejolt.com/@SussLord

AlmightyZentaco for Tutorials https://www.youtube.com/c/almightyzentaco

All of my friends who have playtested for me

You <3

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

There is a bug where you get stuck with the axe above your head. In order to fix this, shoot an arrow from your bow.

There are still a lot of issues that I am aware of that I did not have time to fix. If something game breaking occurs, please restart the application and let me know to the best of your ability what happened and why.

For my first jam, this was a success, and even though I didn't get as much done as I would like, I am happy with this.
